ComicInfo.Title: And Then There Were Five
ComicInfo.Series: Amanda Hocking's The Hollows: A Hollowland Graphic Novel
ComicInfo.Summary: Remy, Harlow, Blue and Lazlo have finally joined up, and with Ripley the lioness, hunt through the American wastelands for Remy's brother Max. But when a simple scavenging expedition in Las Vegas almost ends in disaster, only a miracle can save them. Can the mysterious Korech and his female disciples be the sign they've waited for? Continuing the enhanced adaptation of Amanda Hocking's best selling novel HOLLOWLAND by #1 New York Times bestseller Tony Lee (X-Men Unlimited, Doctor Who), with fantastic artwork by Steve Uy (Avengers Initiative, JSA Classified)! Dynamite Entertainment proudly presents Amanda Hocking's The Hollows: A Hollowland graphic novel.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-09 14:49:33. [CVDB417129]
